name: places/ChIJjzt_HR_0wokR5AftMc1QADk
formattedAddress: 325 Audubon Ave, New York, NY 10033, USA
adrFormatAddress: 325 Audubon Ave, New York, NY 10033-4204, USA

originalText.text: I am extremely disappointed in the service NOT provided. I have been a patient at this clinic for the past 8 years and have never felt so disrespected. I don’t know why I gave this place a second chance. I originally had an appointment for an annual checkup in August and after waiting over an hour to be called to the back I decided to reschedule. The rescheduling took months to plan because of the high volume which I completely understand. I rescheduled my appointment for today 10/26 at 12:30pm. I arrived to the clinic 10 minutes prior to check in and wait my turn. I was called to the back by the nurse where she took my blood pressure and my weight. That is where this medical visit concluded. I waited until 2:49pm to make my way to the front desk and asked for the manger of the clinic. She was nowhere to be found and I was told she was in and out of meetings. I waited OVER TWO AND A HALF HOURS to not be seen by my “primary health provider”. I ordered a Lyft to arrive to my appointment early and it resulted in being a complete waste of money and time. I am still waiting to hear back from the clinic’s manager as I did not receive any medical checkup of any kind, and also would like my ride to the clinic compensated. It’s sad after so many years to switch healthcare providers but at this point it’s a must unless I plan to spend the entire day there. Complete waste of time.

originalText.text: Walk-ins are welcome here. There's usually a wait of at least an hour. Prepare for a wait of two hours. I didn't like the chiropractor and PT referrals but the rest of the tests at Lenox Hill and bloodwork at the in-clinic lab went great. Dr. Knibbs was nice.

text.text: Walk-ins are welcome here. There's usually a wait of at least an hour. Prepare for a wait of two hours. I didn't like the chiropractor and PT referrals but the rest of the tests at Lenox Hill and bloodwork at the in-clinic lab went great. Dr. Knibbs was nice.

originalText.text: I love my primary care provider. Tony in the call center always takes care with anything I need over the phone and Josmin in the front desk always works diligently in assisting patients

text.text: I love my primary care provider. Tony in the call center always takes care with anything I need over the phone and Josmin in the front desk always works diligently in assisting patients

originalText.text: if you’re looking for a place with caring and understanding providers, this place is for you. the call takers are also patient and help you diligently. 5/5 service!
